resources.string: Click Button Below To Begin Test
How Many Beers have you had tonight?
How many other drinks have you had?
You have 5 seconds to answer this portion!

Although you have passed this test, it does not guarantee that you are fit to drive. 

EVERY TWO MINUTES, A PERSON IS INJURED IN A DRUNK DRIVING CRASH.

In 2014, 9,967 people were killed in alcohol-impaired driving crashes. 

20% of children involved in accidents are accompanied by a drunk driver. 

Drunk driving costs the United States $199 billion a year. 

 In 2011 1.2million drivers were arrested for driving under the influence of alcohol.

 Please make your decisions wisely
